ygData.subject: Re: RE: Mana Madness
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Actually by 20, you should start collecting some WIS items for yourself as well...as that is the turning pt IMO.  You see, the formula goes something like
ygData.messageBody:
> The one recurring thing I see here, is wisdom is everything. Is
> this true? From what I've seen of higher levels, even having near
> double the wisdom of others, you get like enough mana to cast
> half a greater heal or whatever the non-full heal one is (I'm
> only lvl 20). Seems strange that wis is so important if this is the case.
>
> Obarmon, 20th Lvl Cleric

Actually by 20, you should start collecting some WIS items for yourself as
well...as that is the turning pt IMO. You see, the formula goes something
like this...for ever 5 WIS = (lvl) manna. EX: at lvl 20 for ever 5 WIS I get
20 manna and at lvl 21 for ever 5 WIS I get 21 manna...that means that by 50
for ever 1 WIS you get 10 manna. So you want as much WIS as you can the
higher lvl you go...cause each pt of WIS gets converted to more manna the
higher lvl you go...and that means more cast, more heals, etc.

-Imogen
